data.blankContent: According to the interviewee from the secondary school, KM can help a lot in both learning for students and management of information for the school. Student ____ or ____ are ____ through Internet, ____ can ____ easily ____ access ____ them ____ once ____ it ____ uploaded. Meanwhile, in such way, teachers or students can trace back the previous works for reference very conveniently.
data.partBlankContent: According to the interviewee from the secondary school, KM can help a lot in both learning for students and management of information for the school. Student asses______ or assig______ are subm_____ through Internet, teac____ can th__ easily g__ access t_ them a_ once wh__ it i_ uploaded. data.fullContent: According to the interviewee from the secondary school, KM can help a lot in both learning for students and management of information for the school. Student assessments or assignments are submitted through Internet, teachers can then easily get access to them at once when it is uploaded. Meanwhile, in such way, teachers or students can trace back the previous works for reference very conveniently.
data.answer: 根据来自中学的受访者，知识管理对学生学习和学校信息管理都有很大的帮助。学生的评估或作业是通过互联网提交的，上传后，老师可以很容易地立即访问它们。同时，这样老师或学生可以很方便的追溯到以前的作品，以供参考。
